Name: GeographicLocationName
Description: A name for the GeographicLocation. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the GeographicLocation. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the GeographicLocation. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: GeographicLevelReference
Description: Reference to an existing GeographicLevel describing structural level to which these locations belong.

Name: GeographicLevelDescription
Description: A description of the GeographicLevel. May be expressed in multiple languages and supports the use of structured content.

Name: AuthorizedSource
Description: An identifiable authorization source repeated for each identifying code type. This allows the codes to be used as representations for response domains and value representations by designating a specific set of locations and the code of an authorization source. An authorization source should differentiate between codes derived for different purposes within the same agency.

Name: LocationValue
Description: A location of the specified geographic level providing information on its name, identification codes, temporal and spatial coverage.
